snippet.title: "ARENA" - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW for PC, Mac and Linux. Play FREE online at itch.io and scratch.mit.edu

ARENA is a fast paced combat platformer - Fight your friends or the AI for dominance. Use a variety of weapons to destroy the competition, across many distant arenas, while unlocking unique skins. Who will be the first to master the arena?

Pixel art by @chaotic_visual

https://the-chaotic.itch.io/arena
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/139025103/
